fields.name: AdminPublicKey
fields.description: Specifies the SSH rsa public key file as a string. Use "ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 2048" to generate your SSH key pairs.

fields.name: SshPort
fields.description: Describes the port for connecting through SSH.

fields.name: SshPublicAccess
fields.description: State of the public SSH port. Possible values are: Disabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on this instance. Enabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is open and accessible according to the VNet/subnet policy if applicable.
